item.title: Anything wrong with this?
item.dc:creator: @Vert Vert
item.description:
@Vert wrote:

Anything wrong?

My range only hits 1s…

public void CalculateRange() { double MaxHit = 0; int RangeBonus = playerBonus[4]; //Range Bonus int Range = playerLevel[5]; //Range { MaxHit += (double)(1.05 + (double)((double)(RangeBonus * Range) * 0.0016821261243472372311)); } //MaxHit += (double)(Range * 0.1); playerMaxHitRange = (int)Math.floor(MaxHit); } public void CalculateRangePlayer(int ID) { double MaxHit = 0; double PlayerHitz = 0; int PlayerBonus = PlayerHandler.players[ID].playerBonus[9] / 2; int PlayerLevelRng = PlayerHandler.players[ID].playerLevel[5]; int RangeBonus = playerBonus[4]; //Range Bonus int Range = playerLevel[5]; //Range RangeHit = ((PlayerBonus + PlayerLevelRng) / 2); RangeHitminus = ((PlayerBonus + PlayerLevelRng) / 3); //int minus = (int)Math.floor(RangeHitminus); //int plus = (int)Math.floor(RangeHit); int HitAdd = misc.random(RangeHit); if(HitAdd <= RangeHitminus){ MaxHit += (double)(1.05 + (double)((double)(RangeBonus * Range) * 0.0016821261243472372311)); sendMessage("Hits From random "+RangeHit+", "+HitAdd+": "+RangeHitminus); } else { MaxHit = 0; sendMessage("Blocked: From random: "+HitAdd+", "+RangeHitminus); } playerMaxHitRange = (int)Math.floor(MaxHit); }
